kpi.name: LTE_1074a
kpi.formula:
decode( (lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs0 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs1 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs2 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs3 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs4 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs5 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs6 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs7 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs8 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs9 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs10 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs11 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs12 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs13 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs14 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs15 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs16 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs17 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs18 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs19 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs20 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs21 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs22 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs23 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs24 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs25 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs26 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs27 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs28 + nvl(lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs29,0) + nvl(lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs30,0) + nvl(lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs31,0)),0,null,
(0*lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs0 + 1*lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs1 + 2*lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs2 + 3*lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs3 + 4*lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs4 + 5*lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs5 + 6*lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs6 + 7*lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs7 + 8*lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs8 + 9*lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs9 + 10*lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs10 + 11*lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs11 + 12*lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs12 + 13*lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs13 + 14*lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs14 + 15*lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs15 + 16*lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs16 + 17*lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs17 + 18*lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs18 + 19*lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs19 + 20*lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs20 + 21*lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs21 + 22*lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs22 + 23*lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs23 + 24*lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs24 + 25*lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs25 + 26*lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs26 + 27*lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs27 + 28*lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs28 + 29*nvl(lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs29,0) + 30*nvl(lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs30,0) + 31*nvl(lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs31,0)) / (lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs0 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs1 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs2 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs3 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs4 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs5 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs6 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs7 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs8 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs15 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs16 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs17 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs18 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs19 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs20 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs21 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs22 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs23 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs24 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs25 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs26 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs27 + lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs28 + nvl(lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs29,0) + nvl(lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs30,0) + nvl(lcelld.pdsch_trans_using_mcs31,0)))

kpi_info.title: Average used MCS on PDSCH transmissions
kpi_info.use: Average used Modulation and Coding Scheme on PDSCH transmissions (SIB, Paging and RA response excluded)
kpi_info.formula:
SUM( 0*PDSCH_TRANS_USING_MCS0 +
1*PDSCH_TRANS_USING_MCS1 +
2*PDSCH_TRANS_USING_MCS2 +
3*PDSCH_TRANS_USING_MCS3 +
